help: Return the metadata of a resource. :param id: the id of the resource :type id: string :rtype: dictionary

result.description:
Source: FBI Uniform Crime Report, 2014 (https://www.fbi.gov/about-us/cjis/ucr/ucr)

Includes information on the frequency of property crimes in general, burglary, larceny-theft, motor vehicle theft and arson. All crime rates are per 100,000 people.

(Note: New York City does not release arson statistics; therefore, the listed rate of "0" is inaccurate.)
result.name: Property Crime Data for the Ten Most Populous Cities in the U.S.
